title: Age Ain't Nothing But a Number
itunes:title: Age Ain't Nothing But a Number
description:
Tuesday 1/30- Today on the show we had Florida Mayor Andrew Gillum stop by, who spoke about running for governor, the Florida school systems, crime and much more. Also, we opened up the phone lines to give one of our listeners a chance to shoot their shot at a crush for "Shoot Your Shot" and this time it was 18 year old shooting their shot at a 42 year old, do the math. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to radio host Alex Reimer for his comments about Tom Brady's children. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Tuesday 1/30- Today on the show we had Florida Mayor Andrew Gillum stop by, who spoke about running for governor, the Florida school systems, crime and much more. Also, we opened up the phone lines to give one of our listeners a chance to shoot their shot at a crush for "Shoot Your Shot" and this time it was 18 year old shooting their shot at a 42 year old, do the math. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to radio host Alex Reimer for his comments about Tom Brady's children. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
